product.title: The Jungle Book | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Early readers will explore the delights of nature and experience the true power of friendship in this classic Disney tale. Young Mowgli, who was raised by wolves, has no desire to live the life of a human. When his beloved forest friends fear for his safety and encourage him to go to the man village, Mowgli resists and finds himself kidnapped by monkeys, beginning a dangerous adventure that spans a rich variety of jungle settings and characters. The story culminates during the ferocious battle between Mowgli and his gang against Shere Khan, a ferocious tiger. As Mowgli encounters one thrill after another, he and his friends all learn some valuable lessons about belonging, helping one another, and having an open mind.

Tie-in Activity: Take your child on a jungle adventure in your own backyard, encouraging her to point out any animals, insects, plants, flowers, or other interesting specimens. Keep in mind, however, that some plants are poisonous, so while enjoying nature, be sure to keep an eye on younger children who tend to put things in their mouths.
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Mowgli.
